extends Object

    Class that represents the table of firewall rules on a host

                           IPAddress source,

                           PortRange sourcePortRange,
                           IPAddress destination,
                           IPAddress destinationMask,
                           PortRange destinationPortRange)
        Add a firewall rule in the firewall rule table
        Parameters:
        action - the action if the rule is matched
        protocol - the protocol
        source - the source ip
        sourceMask - the source mask
        sourcePortRange - the source port range
        destination - the destination ip
        destinationMask - the destination mask
        destinationPortRange - the destination port range
        Returns:
        a added rule

      • packetCanPass

        public boolean packetCanPass(FirewallRule.Protocol protocol,
                    IPAddress source,
                    IPAddress sourceMask,
                    int sourcePort,
                    IPAddress destination,
                    IPAddress destinationMask,
                    int destinationPort)
        Test if a packet can pass according to the firewall rules
        Parameters:
        protocol - the protocol used
        source - the source ip address
        sourceMask - the mask source
        sourcePort - the port source (port number)
        destination - the destination ip address
        destinationMask - the destination mask
        destinationPort - the port destination (port number)
        Returns:
        true if the packet can pass the host, else false
